text: midneunjadeul-iyeo neohuiga eodneun joh-eun yangsig gaundeseo geuligo hana nim-i neohoeleul wihae ttang-eulobuteo geo duwo jun geos gaunde joh-eun geosdeullo hoesaleul hal geos-imyeo neohuiga nun-eul gam ji anhgoneun badji anihaneun nappeun geos deullo huisahaji malla geuligo hana nim-eun pung-yohasigo modeun chanmileul hol lo bad-eusim-eul alla
